The Macquarie Labyrinth

The Macquarie Labyrinth was a puzzle hunt-style event I made in highschool inspired by Notpron (a fantastic puzzle website whose final level involves conning the creator who, in all fairness, is also an amazing puzzle game designer).

Now that I can host it on a website, I've attempted to recreate the original hunt to the best of my ability. Each puzzle is unlocked by finding the password to the previous one and entering it in all lowercase in the following password-encrypted link.

To enter the labyrinth, enter the first password: iamready

~ m ~ o ~ n ~ o ~ c ~ e ~ r ~ o ~ s ~

The Macquarie Labyrinth

~ m ~ o ~ n ~ o ~ c ~ e ~ r ~ o ~ s ~

If you correctly get the final answer marge, you've gone as far as the labyrinth was ever developed.
Congratulations!
